title: Disrupting White Supremacy From Within: White People On What We Need To Do
description: Through careful, thoughtful examination of the nature and workings of race, racism, and white supremacy, the contributors--an all-white group of theologians, ethicists, teachers, ministers, and activists--have provided a resource that will help white people do their own soul-searching, acknowledging the devastating effects of racism on people of color, and taking their own steps toward its abolishment.
author: Jennifer    Harvey
